job.title: Software Developer - Solutions Developer
job.description: stronguOverviewbrbrustrongWe are not just offering a job but a meaningful career Come join our passionate teambrbrAs a Fortune 50 company we hire the best employees to serve our customers making us a leader in the insurance and financial services industry State Farm embraces diversity and inclusion to ensure a workforce that is engaged builds on the strengths and talents of all associates and creates a Good Neighbor culturebrbrWe offer competitive benefits and pay with the potential for an annual financial award based on both individual and enterprise performance Our employees have an opportunity to participate in volunteer events within the community and engage in a learning culture We offer programs to assist with tuition reimbursement professional designations employee development wellness initiatives and morebrbrVisit our Careers page for more information on our benefits locations and the process of joining the State Farm teambrbrstrongOFFICE LOCATION Richardson TX Dunwoody GA Tempe AZ Bloomington IL brbrstrongstrongHybrid Work Environmentstrong Selected applicants should plan to spend time working from home and some time working in the office as eg H1B visa for this opportunitybrbrstronguResponsibilitiesbrbrustrongstrongInterested in a challenging position to design amp build strategic Architecture on Public Cloud  brbrstrongstrongWell we have the right position for you  Come join usbrbrstrongClaims Engineering Architecture amp AAP Product Suite is seeking a Software Developer to join the Claims Cloud Eventing product team This cloudnative product is part of the Engineering and Architecture product suite wherein it provides a more advanced and futuristic Event consumption capabilities utilizing an Event Driven Architecture This will be a critical foundational capability as part of the modernization of the PampC Claims experience enabling Automation as well as ML driven flows for an upgraded customer experience The individual selected will be a part of high performing and empowered product team to design develop and implement new product functionalities along with troubleshooting application issues as they arisebrbrAnalyst will also be undertaking future challenging and innovative work leveraging MLAI capabilities for building future strategic Claims solutions providing industryleading
